io.getstream.client.service

Interface NotificationActivityService<T extends BaseActivity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Subtype of BaseActivity representing the activity type to handle.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NotificationActivityServiceImpl

    public interface NotificationActivityService<T extends BaseActivity>
    Provide methods to interact with Notification activities of subtype of BaseActivity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getActivities()
      Get a list of activities using the standard filter (limit = 25).
      StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getActivities(FeedFilter filter, boolean markAsRead, boolean markAsSeen)
      List notification activities using the given filter.
      StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getActivities(FeedFilter filter, MarkedActivity markAsRead, MarkedActivity markAsSeen)
      List notification activities using the given filter.

    • Method Detail

      • getActivities

        StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getActivities(FeedFilter filter,
                                                      MarkedActivity markAsRead,
                                                      MarkedActivity markAsSeen)
                                               throws IOException,
                                                      StreamClientException
        List notification activities using the given filter. Futhermore, mark a list of given activities MarkedActivity as read and/or seen.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter to use to filter out the activities
        markAsRead - A list of activity ids to be marked as read.
        markAsSeen - A list of activity ids to be marked as seen.
        Returns:
        List of notification activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • getActivities

        StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getActivities(FeedFilter filter,
                                                      boolean markAsRead,
                                                      boolean markAsSeen)
                                               throws IOException,
                                                      StreamClientException
        List notification activities using the given filter. Futhermore, mark all activities MarkedActivity as read and/or seen.
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter to use to filter out the activities
        markAsRead - If true, mark all the activities as read. If false leave them untouched.
        markAsSeen - If true, mark all the activities as seen. If false leave them untouched.
        Returns:
        List of notification activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception

      • getActivities

        StreamResponse<NotificationActivity<T>> getActivities()
                                               throws IOException,
                                                      StreamClientException
        Get a list of activities using the standard filter (limit = 25).
        Returns:
        List of notification activities
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network/socket exceptions
        StreamClientException - in case of functional or server-side exception
